page.title: 18A Schoolboy's Day in Alford
page.content: "A Primary school pupil" by Lee. My brother is called Nigel and he is nine years old. On school days he gets up at seven o clock to have his breakfast and gets ready for school. At about 8.20am he leaves the house with my dad and goes to school, which is Alford Primary School. At 9.00am he is ready to start lessons. At 10.25am he has his mid_morning break and then at 11.50am he has his packed lunch. At 3.30pm Nigel and dad come home. Nigel then usually goes out to play until 5.00pm when we have tea. He then again goes out to play, unless there is something good on t.v, until about 8.00pm. He then has his supper and goes to bed at 9.00pm. He goes swimming at the John Spendluffe School on Tuesday and at the Grammar School on Sundays.
